channel.title: Mission on Chris Short
channel.description: Recent content in Mission on Chris Short

item.title: North Carolina Veterans Oral History Interview Part 3
item.description: As part of a North Carolina State Archives initiative to obtain oral histories of veterans I volunteered to be interviewed for the North Carolina Veterans Oral History Collection. I was interviewed by Matthew Peek, Military Collection Archivist for the North Carolina Department of Natural and Cultural Resources (later referred to as MP). (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); The interview was well worth the time it took to coordinate and conduct it.
